data.title: one of our favorites in the cleveland area
data.text: many areas of the country have traditions. north east ohio has there's. the friday night fish fry. i have been to a few but my favorite is the lake erie perch at the ridgewood inn, parma oh.don't let the decor fool you. it was part of a bowling alley at one time and is still decorated in that wonderful gone era. now the important thing the food. if you like fish fry's get over there on friday nights as often as you can. the quality of the meals are outstanding. and you will not leave hungry. don't forget the home made cabbage and noodle's and spend the extra dollar and get the perogies instead of fries. they have a full bar, only one beer on tap but it's usually a quality one. the  service is excellent. this time we had julie. and we also stayed over an extra night to have friday dinner there. a must when visiting the cleveland area
